title: How can i get S on Zed?
body:
I played Zed and went 20/1/5 and I got A+ 
In some other game, I played zed and went 5/0/0 and got S 
Can someone explain me what do I need to do to get a simple S? Thanks...
cant even believe it.

replies.body: Every post here is pretty accurate, anyway it compares your zed stats to other zeds in that lane/role, cs,time,kills,deaths,assists,wards,wards cleared, all of it etc. I really hope someone posts the" PLAY HIM AP hurr durr," It has worked before. The S? idk prob not, you silly goose the mage zed,

Nah, with that score you had to have 5 cs per min or less to not get an S. Just stay at around 6 cs per min on an assassin with a score like that and you'll get an S. Though the golden number for an S is about 7.5+ cs per minute coupled with a good KDA.
Thank you, I finally got it. I went 17/1/7 with 278 cc
Play him as a Support, ADC, or Jungle. That's how you get an S.
Thank you, I heard about that one but I played him mid xD

My biggest guess is that you don't have enough cs. 
In any game past 20 minutes you almost guaranteed won't get any form of "s" without 200+ CS. Goodluck if you're going for mastery tokens!
Thank you, I finally got it. Got my S, 17/1/7, 278 cc... Finally lvl 7 Zed
